title: Bitwarden design flaw: Server side iterations
dot:
digraph PasswordManagers{node[shape=rectangle, style=filled, color=lightgrey]; LastPass[label="LastPass
- Low PBKDF2 iterations
- Failed to encrypt all data
- Downplayed breaches"];Bitwarden[label="Bitwarden
- 100,000 client-side PBKDF2 iterations
- 100,000 server-side iterations (ineffective)
- Increased to 350,000 for new accounts
- Encrypts all data"];OnePassword[label="1Password
- Secret key functionality
- Strong encryption even with weak passwords"]; LastPass->Bitwarden[label="Similar default iterations"];Bitwarden->OnePassword[label="Lacks secret key functionality"];OnePassword->LastPass[label="Better encryption practices"]; subgraph cluster_1{label="Security Concerns and Improvements";style=dashed; LastPassIssues[label="LastPass Issues
- Low iterations
- Unencrypted data
- Poor breach response"];BitwardenIssues[label="Bitwarden Issues
- Ineffective server-side iterations
- Older accounts with lower security"];Improvements[label="Improvements
- Bitwarden increased iterations
- Argon2 support proposed"]; LastPass->LastPassIssues;Bitwarden->BitwardenIssues;Bitwarden->Improvements;} subgraph cluster_2{label="Recommendations";style=dotted; StrongPassword[label="Use strong master passwords"];Diceware[label="Diceware passphrase
(5 words for high security)"];OWASP[label="Follow OWASP recommendations
(Current: 600,000 iterations)"]; StrongPassword->Diceware;StrongPassword->OWASP;}}

title: Seven years on, what do we know about the disappearance of flight MH370? (2021)
dot: digraph MH370{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor="#f0f8ff", fontsize=10, fontname="Arial"];edge[fontname="Arial", fontsize=9];subgraph cluster_intro{label="Introduction";style=dashed;"MH370 Disappearance"->"Last Communication: 1:19 a.m., March 8, 2014";}subgraph cluster_event{label="Event Timeline";style=dashed;"Last Communication: 1:19 a.m., March 8, 2014"->"Transponder Turned Off: 1:20 a.m.";"Transponder Turned Off: 1:20 a.m."->"Disappeared from Radar over South China Sea";"Disappeared from Radar over South China Sea"->"Military Radar Tracking until 2:22 a.m.";"Military Radar Tracking until 2:22 a.m."->"Satellite Handshakes until 8:19 a.m.";}subgraph cluster_search{label="Search Efforts";style=dashed;"Initial Search in South China Sea"->"Expanded to Strait of Malacca and Andaman Sea";"Expanded to Strait of Malacca and Andaman Sea"->"Satellite Data Analysis by Inmarsat";"Satellite Data Analysis by Inmarsat"->"Search in Southern Indian Ocean";}subgraph cluster_theories{label="Theories";style=dashed;"Possible Hijacking"->"Pilot Involvement: Zaharie Ahmed Shah";"Possible Hijacking"->"Accidental Scenarios: Fire or Decompression";"Pilot Involvement: Zaharie Ahmed Shah"->"Flight Simulator Route Matching Actual Path";"Accidental Scenarios: Fire or Decompression"->"Improbable Series of Events";}subgraph cluster_conclusion{label="Conclusion";style=dashed;"No Conclusive Evidence Found"->"Continued Mystery and Speculation";"Continued Mystery and Speculation"->"Future Search Efforts Hoped";}"MH370 Disappearance"->"Search Efforts";"Search Efforts"->"Theories";"Theories"->"Conclusion";}
